TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Store implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook._Store

summary.span: 代表本地计算机或网络驱动器上的文件，该文件存储当前配置文件中的帐户的电子邮件和其他项目。

span.span: Represents a file on the local computer or a network drive that stores e-mail messages and other items for an account in the current profile.

para.span: 这是.NET 接口派生的互操作性与相应的 COM 对象的托管代码需要 COM coclass。

span.span: This is a .NET interface derived from a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

para.span: 使用此派生的接口访问 COM 对象的所有方法、 属性和事件的成员。

span.span: Use this derived interface to access all method, property, and event members of the COM object.

para.span: 但是，如果方法或想要使用的事件共享相同的名称相同的 COM 对象下，强制转换为相应的主接口调用方法，并强制转换为最新的事件接口，连接到该事件。

span.span: However, if a method or event you want to use shares the same name under the same COM object, cast to the corresponding primary interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

para.span: 请参阅本主题的 COM 对象有关的信息。

span.span: Refer to this topic for information about the COM object.

para.span: 有关 COM 对象的方法和属性成员的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the method and property members of the COM object, see .

para.span: 一个配置文件可以定义一个或多个电子邮件帐户，而每个电子邮件帐户都与一个特定类型的服务器相关联。对于 Exchange 服务器，存储区可以在服务器上、在 Exchange 公用文件夹中，或者在本地的个人文件夹文件 (.pst) 或脱机文件夹文件 (.ost) 中。对于 POP3、IMAP 或 HTTP 电子邮件服务器，存储区是一个 .pst 文件。

span.span: A profile defines one or more e-mail accounts, and each e-mail account is associated with a server of a specific type. For an Exchange server, a store can be on the server, in an Exchange Public folder, or in a local Personal Folders File (.pst) or Offline Folder File (.ost). For a POP3, IMAP, or HTTP e-mail server, a store is a .pst file.

para.span: 您可以使用和存储对象，枚举所有文件夹和搜索当前会话中的所有存储区上的文件夹。

span.span: You can use the and Store objects to enumerate all folders and search folders on all stores in the current session.

para.span: 由于获得的根文件夹或存储区中的搜索文件夹，才能开放的存储而打开存储施加性能开销，您可以检查属性决定继续操作之前。

span.span: Since getting the root folder or search folders in a store requires the store to be open and opening a store imposes an overhead on performance, you can check the property before you decide to pursue the operation.

para.span: 如果您使用 Exchange 服务器，您可以访问其他显式内置存储的属性存储特征，如， ，和。

span.span: If you use an Exchange server, you can access other explicit built-in Store properties for store characteristics such as , , and .

para.span: 使用对象返回访问其他的 Outlook 对象模型中未公开的属性存储。

span.span: Use the object returned by to access other store properties that are not exposed in the Outlook object model.

para.span: 文件夹和存储中存储 Outlook 项目的详细信息，请参阅存储 Outlook 项目

span.span: For more information on storing Outlook items in folders and stores, see Storing Outlook Items
